statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE drug1_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, alert_message FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE alert_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE drug1_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND drug2_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM drug_interaction_alerts ORDER BY alert_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE drug1_id = 'c7b9e97e-2377-4d39-8912-82de1ad7ba7d';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE drug2_id = '73190d1d-63e3-45ed-9c20-3477d18e31b4' ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug1_id, drug2_id FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%interact%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE alert_message ILIKE '%warning%' AND drug1_id = '4c3d3a81-f77d-4e2b-ba42-b9b81004bbf9';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, drug1_id, drug2_id FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE drug1_id = '18f576e0-5617-425f-aa1b-3c1f3e90dc5a' OR drug2_id = 'c5a27a7b-bc63-43d9-8ec1-3db4a22aaded';
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM DrugInteractions ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE prescription_required = true;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, dosage, prescription_required FROM Drugs WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE prescription_required = TRUE;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drugs ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE dosage > 50 AND prescription_required = TRUE;
SELECT interaction_id, drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type, alert_level FROM DrugInteractions ORDER BY alert_level;
SELECT interaction_id, drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction_alerts;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotic';
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%Severe%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts ORDER BY interaction_id DESC, drug1_id ASC, drug2_id DESC
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drugs WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotic'
SELECT interaction_id, drug1_id, drug2_id, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%severe%'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 60 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE severity_level > 2;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT alert_description, severity_level FROM drug_interaction_alerts JOIN interactions ON drug_interaction_alerts.alert_id = interactions.alert_id WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE severity_level > 2;
SELECT drug_name, drug_type FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug1_id, drug2_id, alert_description FROM drug_interaction_alerts WHERE alert_id = 5;
SELECT interaction_id, patient_id, physician_id FROM interactions WHERE drug_interaction_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, drug_category FROM Drug WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM Interaction;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctor WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE drug_category = 'Painkiller';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT Drug.drug_name, Interaction.interaction_type FROM Drug JOIN Interaction ON Drug.drug_id = Interaction.drug_id1;
SELECT Alert.alert_id, Alert.alert_message, Drug.drug_name FROM Alert JOIN Interaction ON Alert.interaction_id = Interaction.interaction_id JOIN Drug ON Interaction.drug_id1 = Drug.drug_id;

SELECT Doctor.doctor_name, Doctor.specialization, Alert.alert_message FROM Doctor JOIN Interaction ON Doctor.doctor_id = Interaction.interaction_id JOIN Alert ON Interaction.interaction_id = Alert.interaction_id;
